mapper.select: select count(cid) from auto_warehouseDB.cargo where sid=#{sid}, suid=#{suid}, state="not expire";
mapper.insert: insert into auto_warehouseDB.cargo (sid, sname, productionDate, shelfLife, inputTime, state, suid) values (#{cargo.sid}, #{cargo.sname}, #{cargo.productionDate}, #{cargo.shelfLife}, #{cargo.inputTime}, #{cargo.state}, #{cargo.suid});
mapper.update: update auto_warehouseDB.cargo set outputTime=#{outputTime} where cid=#{cid};
